full_summary:
# Pest Control Services for the High Commission of Canada in Jamaica
## Notice Reference: cb-165-77446310

The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development Canada is soliciting for proposals for Pest Control Services for the High Commission of Canada in Jamaica, located in Kingston. The selected contractor will provide a range of pest control services for various sites, including the Chancery, Official Residence, and Staff Quarter Residences.

## Procurement Information

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)

**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding

**Selection Criteria:** Lowest Cost-per-Point

**Trade Agreements:** This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)

## Tender Requirements

The contractor will be required to provide a comprehensive pest control service to various sites, including:

* Chancery: located at 3 West Kings House Road, measuring approximately 6,350 m2
* Official Residence: located at 14 Seymour Avenue, measuring approximately 456 m2
* Staff Quarter Residences: located throughout Jack's Hill, Russell Heights, Cherry Gardens, Norbrook Road, Barbican, Manor Park, Arcadia, and Waterworks

## Contract Terms

The selected contractor will be required to provide a range of pest control services, including but not limited to:

* Mosquito control
* Rodent control
* Cockroach control
* Termite control
* Ant control
* Slug and snail control

The contractor will be required to provide all personnel, supervision, labour, uniforms, materials, supplies, tools, equipment, and other items related to the services.

## Contact Information

* Name: Nancy Levasseur
* Email: internationalproposals@international.gc.ca
* Phone: 343-203-0000
